name: I'm new here
description:
This is a game made for the Rainbow Game Jam 2019

Developed by Marina Díez

Music by Erin Holmes

I made this game inspired by my feelings when I arrive to a new place: a new job, the first time I go to a game event, when I go to a party and there are lots of people that I don't know. 

I'm new here is a game about building communities, taking care of yourself and others, as well as being very brave and go outside your comfort zone with the support of your beloved ones.
